resources.string:
This application was created to help bridge the gap between companies/individuals who provide sewerage services and Siaya residents who need the services 
This is an important step to achieving the SDG goal Clean water and sanitation 
This page basically explains how the app solves that 
Book Services section It enables you to be able to view the companies/individuals who are providing sewerage services, where they are located, when they are available and the reviews they have. 
 Bookings section In this you will able to view any bookings made whether current or past bookings and the details of the bookings(i.e. date, service provider and whether or not the service was provided). 
Profile Section In this section the user will be able to view their profile, update details of the profile or logout from the application.
